sub_title: Polish CPA (PIBR)| Interim Finance Professional| Available for interim assignments starting Feb 2024
summary: ACCA and Polish CPA with 14 years of experience within finance teams of big international companies and audit firms.  I'm a high performing finance professional with in-depth knowledge of various aspects of accounting, challenging status-quo and searching for improvements, able to learn quickly and work under pressure. I enjoy working in constantly changing  and multicultural environments.
